Solitude

May I prefer solitude because my immediate social environment doesn't suit me?

The reason I want this may be:

  • §Relaxation It allows me to be less self-conscious and to just do whatever I want, without concern for others.

  • Autonomy (SDT) See above.

  • Competence (SDT) Allows me to be creative and to work on something difficult, without distraction. Also allows me to be completely creative, to think about whatever I want.

So, how do we make time for that?

  • Incremental thinking with headphones
  • Making use of the time Mieke isn't at home for reading/thinking

If it's mostly about getting time for relaxing:

  • Going for a run
  • Working out

See also Averill 2003.
